featured.text: He is better known for his watercolors than his illustrations and oil paintings.
His paintings constantly reflected his desire to escape from society.
In 1968, he began to turn away from photography and returned to his passion for drawing and painting.
Showing great talent in painting, Moran was soon hired as an illustrator at Scribner’s Monthly, and later appointed chief illustrator by age 34.
Onions are depicted in many paintings 36 inside pyramids and tombs that span the history of ancient Egypt.

other.text: A man of multiple talents, Homer excelled equally in the arts of illustration, oil painting, and watercolor.

His vivid paintings brought the splendor of the extraordinary landscapes before the eyes of American people, thus setting the stage for the regions to be widely recognized and officially established as national parks.
This painting is nothing E.…no place is like home.
He achieved international fame with his vivid paintings of England.
Moran began painting by age 15, inspired by the landscape paintings of the British master J.M.W. Turner.

definition.zh_def: 繪畫；用顏料創作的藝術作品
definition.en_def: The act or art of applying pigment to a surface to create an image or design.
definition.example: She spent the afternoon painting a beautiful landscape.
